page.title: 02RAISING MONEY FOR CHARITY
page.content: There was a sponsored walk along a half mile stretch of the unopened M42.There was a fair so you could have a break from walking.At each end of the walk there were people who gave you a sticker every time you completed half a mile.They were given out so that nobody cheated. Some of the participants were dressed up.There were clowns and convicts.There were about 2000 people there while I was walking.The money raised went to the Oesophageal Cancer Reserch appeal at East Birmingham Hospital.{M.Green In Christian Aid Week Silvermead third year organized a fund raising scheme.We baked cakes,brought toys and comics to sell.We also had some raffles .Altogether we raised Â£35.{ {Silvermead School}
